body_html:
@thirupalanisamy @martinwicke FYI.
We used to have an s390x build setup by @Nayana-ibm with a setup similar to what you are suggesting. However, that machine seems to be offline at the moment. There are also some upcoming changes in our CI infrastructure, so we may need to come up with a longer term plan for such use cases.

Thiru, can we open a separate communication channel to @tjingrant 's team to discuss how we can make life easier for IBM Research?
